NL System Query: To start off, can I see a win condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Wait, I think I want to see another way that I'm able to win.
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: How would another player affect my win?
User Response: Another player is not able to violate your winning condition.

NL System Query: Could you demonstrate a third win condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Go back to that original win you showed me when we started playing. Can another player undo this win condition?
Going back to this board here, what if I add a piece to that empty spot? Would I still win?
For the second win condition that you showed to me, is the reason for this win the color of the tiles?
User Response: No. The tiles can be any color and you would still have a win condition.
Comments: any color may not be correct

NL System Query: How can I rotate the pieces and still win?
User Response: You can align them along the diagonal or you can put them vertically.

NL System Query: How can I translate this board?
User Response: You can shift all of the pieces to the first, second, or third row.
